meta.author: Stefan Smieskol
meta.description:
File description: This file contains registers definition for accessing standard ORION data. Standard ORION data are all the accessible data of a ORION that come with a default setup (a system with no setup file). All the registers defined in this mapping are also accessible on any configured system. Therefore this mapping is used as a base to build specific customer mappings.
Related Setup: This file is not related to any specific setup. The purpose of this file is to contain registers that might be available for all setups. It does not content any customer configuration.
Compatibility: This mapping is compatible with ORION V5.20.
History: revision: 1 date: 14.03.2013 author: Stéphane Ruel purpose: Standard mapping file for Orion compatible with version V5.20 changes: This file is based on PSC3_ModbusSlave_Mapping_StandardRegisters_V3.20_rev2.xml
revision: 2 date: 14.05.2013 author: Stéphane Ruel purpose: Addition of some registers. changes: - Write default values in hexa to be compatible with the schema. - Added discrete inputs 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12. - Added input registers 7193, 7194, 9600, 9601 and 9602.
revision: 3 date: 16.05.2013 author: Stéphane Ruel purpose: Removed registers that do not work with ORION V5.20. changes: Removed not working holding registers 7177 (equalize control), 7180 (Boost charge control) and 7194 (Batt Test control).
revision: 4 date: 16.05.2013
author: Stéphane Ruel purpose: Changes for ORION V5.30, added some new registers and renumbering of others. changes: - Valid from ORION software version V5.30 - Holding registers renumbering. 7178->7180, 7179->7181, 7195->7194. - New coils: 7169 (equalize control), 7170 (Boost charge control), 7171 (Batt Test control) revision: 5 date: 16.01.2014
author: Stefan Smiesko purpose: Mains present variable adding changes: - Valid from ORION software version V5.31 - Added discrete inputs 2100 and 2101 revision: 6 date: 01.04.2014
author: Stefan Smiesko purpose: Modification and variable adding according to Recommended Orion RMS list R01 changes: - Valid from ORION software version V5.31 - added variables according to Recommended Orion RMS list R01_SSm.xls file
revision: 7 date: 30.09.2014
author: Stefan Smiesko purpose: MP alarm required changes: - added disc. inputs #15,16, with rev6. the variables are available as input reg #42,44
